name: A Hammer And The Sea
description:
A Hammer And The Sea is a violent virtual reality physics-based fighting simulator set on a ship deep in the middle of the Atlantic waters during a dark and foggy night featuring a full physics-driven combat system that allows users to creatively live out and execute their most violent fantasies in VR.

Viciously strike down and survive the night against a near-infinite supply of poorly-animated physics-driven opponents with all manner of weapons from nimble and agile spears to two-handed mighty war hammers. 

Embody each swing with your weapon and watch your opponents be sent flying into the far distance never to be seen again. 

The only limits to the engagement and enjoyment are your imagination, decency and stamina to withstand the hoard of enemies who wish to take you down.

Limited to Oculus, support for more headsets coming soon!
